name: Cutthroat Servers
description:
Original hosting link : http://www.modd.io/play/g7ZCbhpml


Controls :

WASD/arrow-keys : to move

LMB : stab/ fire gun/use item

E : pick item

G : drop item

B : open shop - Counter for food/Storage room for guns

Instructions :

Get food from counter and serve it to customer who want those dishes. From tips earn cash.Knock-out other player to make them pay medical bills and reduce there cash, or to grab the dishes they are carrying.The player with most money is on TOP of leaderboard.
